- Today's very special
episode of "Botched"
is sponsored by "The Big Leap,"
a new, uplifting drama on Fox.

This show is about people
from all walks of life
taking a second chance on themselves.

I took my own leap to
start the Babish channel
and make it my full-time job,

and our partnership with
"The Big Leap" is helping me
do the same for someone else, giving them

a second chance to pursue
their culinary passions.
Don't miss the series premiere

on Monday, September 20th
at 9/8 Central on Fox.
